startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Seperate the legs as far apart as comfortable. Do not bend the knees. Extend the arms sideways at shoulder level.

technique.instruction: Keeping the arms straight, twist to the left and bring the right hand down towards to the left big toe. Stretch the straight left arm behind the back keeping both arms in one straight line. Turn the head to the left and gaze at the left outstretched hand.

Twist to the right and bring the left hand down towards to the right big toe. Stretch the straight right arm behind the back keeping both arms in one straight line. Turn the head to the right and gaze at the right outstretched hand.

info: Exhale when twisting and inhale when returning to the center or breath normally throughout the practice.
